feed.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [GRA, RBX, SBG, BHS / France, Canada][ Cisco ASA firewall] – Baremetal – Cisco ASA firewall – Planned Service End of Life
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 31, 10:00 - 11:00 UTC

Dec 6, 12:21 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC
Service impact : As part of the product lifecycle management we plan to end the baremetal service of Cisco ASA firewall by August 31, 2022. This service interruption will concern only the customers who have previously subscribed to this service.
OVHcloud will decommission the service so that you won’t be able to connect to your Cisco ASA firewall from that date.
Please make the appropriate backup of your data prior that date.
---------------------------------------------------
Heure de début : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC
Impact du service : Dans le cadre de la gestion du cycle de vie des produits, nous prévoyons de mettre fin au service baremetal du pare-feu Cisco ASA au 31 aout 2022. Cette interruption de service ne concernera que les clients qui ont précédemment souscrit à ce service.
OVHcloud mettra le service hors service de sorte que vous ne pourrez plus vous connecter à votre pare-feu Cisco ASA à partir de cette date.
Veuillez effectuer les sauvegardes appropriées de vos données avant cette date.

entry.title: [BHS8][Network] - BHS0809B05C
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 8, 10:00 - 11:30 UTC

Jul 21, 20:31 UTC

End time : 08/08/2022 11:30 UTC
Service impact : Private network will be unavailable for 1 hour during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will replace a switch on rack BHS0809B05C.

entry.title: [RBX6][Dedicated Servers] - Rack 46D06
entry.content:
Jul 25, 12:31 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 25/07/2022 10:14 UTC
End Time : 25/07/2022 12:27 UTC
Service impact : All servers are available again.
Root cause : Loss of the Public and vRack network.

Jul 25, 10:43 UTC
Identified - Start time : 25/07/2022 10:14 UTC
Service impact : Some servers are unavailable due to a loss of the Public and vRack network.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently carrying out repairs to return services to you as quickly as possible.

entry.title: [Worldwide][VPS] - Neutron network issue
entry.content:
Jul 25, 12:28 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 23/07/2022 04:00 UTC
End Time : 23/07/2022 12:19 UTC
Service status: Services are working as they should be.
Root cause :We encountered a bug in neutron. The bug is being investigated and a patch will be deployed to prevent this incident in the future.

Jul 25, 10:42 UTC
Identified - Start time : 23/07/2022 04:00 UTC
Service impact : An issue has been discovered relating to the networking component (Neutron). The impact can be observed on both public and private networks.
Impact is limited and not all VMs are impacted. The bug may not impact a VM, but after action such as reboot or migration may cause issues with network.
Ongoing actions : Work in progress to resolve the issue.
Majority of the regions improved.

entry.title: [RBX7][Dedicated Servers] - B708A05
entry.content:
Jul 25, 09:37 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 25/07/2022 04:31 UTC
End Time : 25/07/2022 04:56UTC
Service impact :Due to a hardware problem, the private network was inaccessible for a time period of 25 minutes. Everything is now operational.
Root cause : Hardware equipment failure.

entry.title: [WAW1][Dedicated Servers] - W17B17
entry.content:
Jul 25, 07:40 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 25/07/2022 06:49 UTC
End Time : 25/07/2022 07:30 UTC
Service impact : All servers are operational again.
Root cause : Incident caused by an issue on the cooling system.

Jul 25, 07:07 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 25/07/2022 06:49 UTC
Service impact : Some servers in the rack W17B17 are unreachable.
Ongoing actions : Our team is currently investigating the cause of this issue.
